tool_description: return all lazada sale product by keyword in VietNam
name: Get Sale Lazada
title: Get Sale Lazada

api_list.name: search
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://get-sale-lazada.p.rapidapi.com/lazada-api/tivi"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-sale-lazada.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://get-sale-lazada.p.rapidapi.com/lazada-api/{keyword}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-sale-lazada.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
